comments.comment:
Its not a case of who you like or do not like.

Its a case of giving your vote for the best person to run the country, and give that person the best chance to be the next Sinhela Buddhist President and save the country for the Sinhela people.

No two people like each other even in your work place, but you still have to work together to earn your wages.

Sinhela people it is your right and obligation at this critical stage to save the country from this corrupt US sponsored UNP Ranil/Sirisena government - forget your personal issues.  

Sinhela people your priority is to vote for the Pohottuwe selected nominee Gotabaye to form a hundred percent Sinhela government to prevent Tamils and Muslims taking the Sinhela people‚Äôs rights away in their own only Sinhela country.

Check what happened at the Mulithuvue temple Tamils tried to prevent the Buddhist Monks cremation at the Temple premises, a prime example Sinhela people MUST vote for a Sinhela only government this time to prevent this situation ever happening again.  

Do not make the mistake you made last time, listening to ‚Äòkate katha‚Äô.
comments.author: Srimathie De Silva
